query.prompt:
This text is written in Korean. Create a word table showing the Lemma for each word. The entries in the table are Word, Roman (Word), Lemma, Roman (Lemma), Part of Speech, Case and Note.
* Leave blank if not applicable. * The Note should be writtern in brief, e.g. archaic. * Quotation marks should be excluded.
1 우리 인생의 한가운데서 9 내가 그곳에서 본 다른 것들에 대해 말하겠다. 28 지친 몸을 조금 쉬게 한 후, 67 그는 나에게 대답했다. "나는 사람이 아니다. 옛날에는 사람이었지만,
query.result: |Word|Roman (Word)|Lemma|Roman (Lemma)|Part of Speech|Case|Note| |---|---|---|---|---|---|---| |우리|uri|우리|uri|pronoun|nominative|1st person plural| |인생|insaeng|인생|insaeng|noun|nominative|| |의|ui|의|ui|particle|genitive|| |한가운데서|hangawundeseo|한가운데|hangawunde|noun|locative|| |내가|naega|내가|naega|pronoun|nominative|1st person singular| |그곳|geukot|그곳|geukot|noun|nominative|| |에서|eseo|에서|eseo|particle|locative|| |본|bon|보다|boda|verb|past tense|| |다른|daleun|다른|daleun|adjective|nominative|| |것들|geotdeul|것|geot|noun|nominative|| |에|e|에|e|particle|dative|| |대해|daehae|대하다|daehada|verb|noun + 하다|| |말하겠다|malhagetda|말하다|malhada|verb|future tense|| |지친|jichin|지치다|jichida|verb|past tense|| |몸을|momul|몸|mom|noun|accusative|| |조금|jogeum|조금|jogeum|adverb||| |쉬게|swige|쉬다|swida|verb|noun + 게|| |한|han|하다|hada|verb|past tense|| |후|hu|후|hu|noun|nominative|| |그는|geune|그는|geune|pronoun|nominative|3rd person singular| |나에게|naege|나에게|naege|pronoun|dative|1st person singular| |대답했다|daedaphaetda|대답하다|daedaphada|verb|past tense|| |나는|naneun|나는|naneun|pronoun|nominative|1st person singular| |사람이|sarami|사람|saram|noun|nominative|| |아니다|anida|아니다|anida|verb|negative present tense|| |옛날에는|yeonnalenae|옛날|yeonnal|noun|locative|| |사람이었지만|saramiessdeoman|사람|saram|noun|nominative||

query.prompt:

1 우리 인생의 한가운데서 2 나는 어두운 숲속에 있었고, 3 곧은 길을 잃어버렸다.
